DataListSpec.Name: Top Prospects Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing top prospect records with respect to total donations.
DataListSpec.Author: Technical Training

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_TOPPROSPECTS as set nocount on;
select PROSPECT.ID, NF.NAME, sum(FINANCIALTRANSACTION.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT) as TOTALGIFTS from dbo.PROSPECT inner join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION on PROSPECT.ID = FINANCIALTRANSACTION.CONSTITUENTID outer apply UFN_CONSTITUENT_DISPLAYNAME(PROSPECT.ID) NF group by PROSPECT.ID, NF.NAME order by sum(FINANCIALTRANSACTION.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT) desc;
